content.name: L+ Engine Mod and Scout Mod
content.author: rat

content:
Enhances booster duration for L and XL engines to mitigate AI buring out their shields. Enhances charge time and travel specs for L and XL engines to lower delays in travel, and make other races more competitive with the Terrans. Increased differences between all-round and travel engines.
Also limits scout ships to mk1 weapons and shields
